name: Roy Tang
text: I didn't bother taking pics lol. The overhead panel above the door on the train I had gotten had lost it's screws and would bend down towards the passengers near the door. Given my height, it fell upon me to either hold it up by hand or let it rest on my head. Buti sana kung magaan! I eventually got tired of it and got off at Cubao station so I could take the next train
